nodes.text: Awrathakka was a Wookiee city built around a giant Wroshyr tree and located on the Wookiee homeworld of Kashyyyk. During the Age of the Empire, Imperial forces enslaved the city's inhabitants and relocated them to Camp Sardo. In 5 ABY, a team of rebels led by Han Solo and Chewbacca infiltrated Awrathakka and used it as a vantage point to launch their assault on Camp Sardo; which led to the liberation of Kashyyyk and the enslaved Wookiees from Imperial rule.
